dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Walk with me. The bandits will be here shortly. Luckily, I have a plan.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: The bandits are trying to starve the city by cutting off our food supply.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: We need to quickly unload the food, and send the ships on thier way.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: If we are lucky, the bandits might chase them out of the harbor - not noticing we unloaded the ships.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Sintel, I need you to use the cranes to unload the food from both ships.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Quickly Sintel! We don't have much time!

dialog.speaker: Sintel
dialog.message: Bugs!? I'll have to deal with them first.

dialog.speaker: Sintel
dialog.message: That was the last of them. Now to unload the ships...

dialog.speaker: Captain
dialog.message: Hurry Sintel! This ship can't stay docked much longer!

dialog.speaker: Captain
dialog.message: The bandits are closing in... Get this ship ready to sail!

dialog.speaker: Captain
dialog.message: Hoist anchor and set sail men, we're off!

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Wow. Looks like I underestimated you kid.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: You did great. Almost got them all.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Looks like the bandits didn't notice us unload the ships.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: Looks like we may have a chance to beat these guys after all.

dialog.speaker: Arya
dialog.message: It won't be easy, but I think we can beat them. We'll have to give it our all.
